Title: Touch Enabled Graph Control WP7
Description: This is a high performance, custom graph control for the WP7 platform.  It supports user touch to scale and translate along the X-axis, accepts custom data to populate the graph, and can draw fill or line charts.  This control smoothly scales to hundreds of thousands of points.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a high performance, custom graph control for the WP7 platform. It supports user touch to scale and translate along the X-axis, accepts custom data to populate the graph, and can draw fill or line charts. This control smoothly scales to hundreds of thousands of points.

For a demonstration of this graph, view this video

Learn more at the creator's website
